title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added multiple redirects across documentation files to resolve broken links and improve navigation.
Clarified SAML authentication flow for GitHub Enterprise Server, specifying redirection behavior when built-in authentication is disabled.
Added a "Further reading" column with model card links to the AI model comparison table in Copilot docs.
Removed `.bin` files from the list of supported attachments in advanced formatting documentation.
